rows.label: qst200503_msg032
rows.name: Hey, you. Are you a Driver?

rows.label: qst200503_msg033
rows.name: I am... Do you need something?

rows.label: qst200503_msg034
rows.name: I see, that's perfect!

rows.label: qst200503_msg035
rows.name:
I'm looking for someone who can
retrieve some cargo for me.

rows.label: qst200503_msg001
rows.name: Retrieve cargo...?

rows.label: qst200503_msg002
rows.name:
Yes. About a year ago,
my ship ran aground.

rows.label: qst200503_msg003
rows.name:
The cargo was left
behind inside the ship.

rows.label: qst200503_msg004
rows.name: What kind of cargo is it?

rows.label: qst200503_msg005
rows.name: ...Paintings.

rows.label: qst200503_msg006
rows.name: Paintings?

rows.label: qst200503_msg007
rows.name:
Yes, what I want you to
retrieve are paintings I made.

rows.label: qst200503_msg012
rows.name: Then, are you a painter?

rows.label: qst200503_msg013
rows.name: No, no, that's not my main job.

rows.label: qst200503_msg014
rows.name:
Painting is just a hobby,
but my love for it is real.

rows.label: qst200503_msg015
rows.name:
...Well, they're not very
good, but they are paintings
I'm attached to.

rows.label: qst200503_msg036
rows.name:
I thought about giving up on them,
but even after a year, I can't.

rows.label: qst200503_msg037
rows.name:
What do you say? Would you be
willing to take on this request?

rows.label: qst200503_msg016
rows.name: I see. They are important to you...

rows.label: qst200503_msg017
rows.name:
Understood. I will be sure
to retrieve your paintings.

rows.label: qst200503_msg018
rows.name: Really!? That's a huge help!

rows.label: qst200503_msg019
rows.name: So, where is the ship that ran aground?

rows.label: qst200503_msg020
rows.name: Uhm... About that...

rows.label: qst200503_msg021
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst200503_msg022
rows.name:
I was the owner of the ship,
but not the captain, so I left
the navigation to the crew.

rows.label: qst200503_msg038
rows.name: I wasn't on the ship at the time.

rows.label: qst200503_msg039
rows.name:
So, I don't know the detailed
route or where it ran aground...

rows.label: qst200503_msg023
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst200503_msg024
rows.name: ...Then there's no way to find it.

rows.label: qst200503_msg025
rows.name: That's right... What should I do?

rows.label: qst200503_msg026
rows.name:
...Is there anyone from the crew
at the time who would know?

rows.label: qst200503_msg027
rows.name: Of course! Someone might remember!

rows.label: qst200503_msg028
rows.name:
Alban-san, could you tell
us about the former crew?

rows.label: qst200503_msg029
rows.name:
Sure. There are three crew
members living in this city.
It should be easy to find them.

rows.label: qst200503_msg030
rows.name:
Their names are... Benito,
Gamillo, and Riddalca.

rows.label: qst200503_msg042
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst200503_msg031
rows.name: Understood. Leave the rest to us.
